showerReviews.reviewText: Shower floor wasn't swept, light in shower is broken. We pay for these showers! $17.00 and you can't even clean it? Disgusting!

You know that the shower was only half ass cleaned when there's body hairs everywhere.. in the shower stall walls, on the floor, and even on the toilet seat. ü§¢ I know they weren't mine since they were dark hairs and mine is red. üò† ‚Ä¶
The shower was filthy come on love‚Äôs you can do better for the drivers

Had a terrible experience at this location. When trying to get a shower the previous night, witnessed a manager threatening a customer with violence over an incident. Then the next day, I was sitting and minding my own business after ‚Ä¶

They DO NOT I REPEAT THEY DO NOT CLEAN their showers. Went in one and there was stuff all over the shower shaved hairs all in the shower and on the floor around it. The panel itself is falling off. Black mold in the bottom corners of shower ‚Ä¶

Cant remember stop here, must have needed a shower.  Well today is 07/28/2023. That being said, I must think some of these reviews should be deleted based off the pics I'm sharing. This points directly at management for not giving the ‚Ä¶

The guy running the fuel desk on 3/29/2023 REALLY needs to find a new job!! Needed a shower after a 14 hour day and he really could care less about ANY customer service. He acted like he was bothered he had to do anything. ONLY reason I ‚Ä¶

Waited 30 minutes for a shower. They say that they are changing the shower notification system. Was very warm in the shower room. Floor was still wet. Fan didn't work. Dirty behind the door.  But no one ever looks there. Right? Never has ‚Ä¶

Very nice and clean store. Always have clean restrooms and shower. They main thing I love stopping here for is the good working washing and drying machines. This store should take pride is such a well managed place.

Wasn't impressed with the showers, shower number 1 was not properly cleaned, dirty floor, someone's lil skid mark on the toilet seat, maby just a bad day on cleaning not sure, at least wipe the dam toilet seat down for the next person.  Lad ‚Ä¶

showerReviews.reviewText: ‚Ä¶ As with every review, I need to address the locker rooms. There is a common/open area with lockers, then several individual rooms with showers, toilets, and sinks in each. These are not stalls, they are full bathrooms with lots of space and ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ but I went in to check it out.  Now if they had actually made the doors to the showers and bathrooms solid from top to bottom maybe I wouldn‚Äôt have been so creeped out, but they‚Äôre not.  A small child or adult could easily stick their ‚Ä¶

Living in a different city, but visiting here often and needing a place to workout and shower after, this is a great facility!  We also use it after we ride bikes or run on Monon.  It‚Äôs a perfect location!

‚Ä¶ The locker rooms are just a larger scale version of the family locker room at the Monon Center. Ideal for families! The way the changing/shower rooms are actually offer significantly more privacy and security than a traditional locker room.

The gym and facility are great. But it‚Äôs COED LOCKER ROOMS. Like seriously?? You expect me to let my wife and daughter use the bathroom or change their clothes or shower with men just walking all around them?? ‚Ä¶
